query:
UPDATE
                    capture_config
                SET
                    last_server_ping = now(), error = $1
                WHERE
                    workspace_id = $2 AND
                    path = $3 AND
                    is_flow = $4 AND
                    trigger_kind = $5 AND
                    server_id = $6 AND
                    last_client_ping > NOW() - INTERVAL '10 seconds'
                RETURNING 1
